GetAllForms.name: GetAllForms
GetAllForms.description: Returns information about all the forms that have been added to the document.

GetFormsByTag.name: GetFormsByTag
GetFormsByTag.description: Returns information about all the forms that have been added to the document with specified tag.

SetFormValue.name: SetFormValue
SetFormValue.description: Sets a value to the specified form.

params.name: internalId
params.description: A unique internal identifier of the form.

params.name: value
params.description: Form value to be set. Its type depends on the form type.

GetFormValue.name: GetFormValue
GetFormValue.description: Returns a value of the specified form.

params.name: internalId
params.description: A unique internal identifier of the form.

comment:
/**
	 * Returns information about all the forms that have been added to the document.
	 * @memberof Api
	 * @typeofeditors ["CDE"]
	 * @alias GetAllForms
	 * @returns {ContentControl[]} - An array with all the forms from the document.
	 * @example
	 * window.Asc.plugin.executeMethod("GetAllForms");
	 */
description: Returns information about all the forms that have been added to the document.
